summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of CORS and authentication fixes. All functionality working perfectly in deployed environment.
passed_tests: Login with admin@shardahr.com / Admin@123 - Authentication successful
Employee Directory loads and shows 28 employees correctly
Employee Directory status filter (Active/Inactive) works properly
Employee profile page loads when clicking View button
Dashboard page loads with correct stats (28 total employees, 4 stats cards)
No CORS or 401 errors in browser console - JWT Bearer tokens working
All navigation and UI interactions function smoothly
